ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] No luck on the gemcutter =(
ygData.msgSnippet: I tried it on a Black Pearl, and nothing happened either.  Holding the gem and right clicking on the cutter didn t work, and neither did holding the cutter and
ygData.messageBody:
I tried it on a Black Pearl, and nothing happened
either. Holding the gem and right clicking on the
cutter didn't work, and neither did holding the cutter
and right clicking on the gem.

*sigh*

Gazamel Prime
Solusek Ro

--- Dave Barrett <djbarret@...> wrote:
> Hi gang
>
> Last night I finally whipped up the gemcutter witht
> the diamond dust
> that had been sitting in my bank all this time.
>
> Did the rclick thing both with a gem and with the
> gemcutter. No luck
> on Emeryld (bah, I can't spell that word), Cat's eye
> agate,
> malachite,
> or a Peridot. Unless this only works on the
> super-rare gems, looks
> like we're out of luck. I'll try to catch a ride to
> Lavastorm and
> pop
> into the temple of Sol Ro where you can buy them
> hp/ac gems (you know
> the ones I'm talking about...).
>
> Keep tinkering!
> Llabak Tharr of CoR
> 35 Mage and master beggar, brewer and tinker(117)
> T Marr
>
>
